meaning: Show off, act silly to amuse others
description: Showing off or acting funny to get attention.

examples.chinese: 她在台上频频耍宝卖萌
examples.translation: She frequently acts silly/cute on stage

examples.chinese: 不要在朋友圈「肆无忌惮」地搞笑耍宝
examples.translation: Don't show off recklessly in your Moments

examples.chinese: 表面上调皮耍宝,其实很社恐
examples.translation: On the surface acting silly, but actually has social anxiety
